item.title: Group discounts are available for the iftar buffet at Coral Beach Resort Sharjah
item.description: Source: Coral Beach Resort Sharjah website. The Coral Beach Resort Sharjah, having just finished a full update of its rooms and amenities, is offering an iftar buffet at its Al Bahar Restaurant. The buffet will feature a variety of traditional Arabic and international dishes, with options like mixed grills, shawarma, hot and cold mezze, stews and biryani, in addition to soups, salads, snacks, and customary Ramadan beverages. Jean Pierre Simon, the Regional General Manager for Northern Emirates at Coral Hotels & Resorts, highlighted Al Bahar restaurant as the perfect location for gatherings to break the fast, suggesting guests round off their dining experience with classic Ramadan sweets like the ever-popular umm Ali and mouhalabia.
